thread.title: Gear review: FRE Power iPhone 6 case by LifeProof
thread.title_full: Gear review: FRE Power iPhone 6 case by LifeProof

author: By Jill K. Robinson
title: Gear review: FRE Power iPhone 6 case by LifeProof
text:
A phone case that’s waterproof, dirtproof, snowproof and shockproof with an integrated battery charger that allows your phone to get two times the battery life? It’s all possible with LifeProof’s FRE Power case. Able to be submersed for 2 meters for one hour, survive dirt and dust (and sand), block snow and ice, and survive drops from 2 meters — it may not be Superman, but it’s a super case. When you forget to charge it, no need to plug into the wall or an external battery. Just flip the switch and get a jolt of energy to extend the journey. An optical-glass lens and Sound Enhancement System ensures your photos are nothing less than stellar and you never have to endure sub-optimal beats. To top it off, the case isn’t much larger than the LifeProof case without the battery charger. 
What we liked: Full phone protection and a battery case in one? That’s the dream for daily adventurers, weekend warriors and travelers who want it all. 
Not so much: Those who prefer that nothing come between their finger and their glass phone screen may not love the built-in scratch protector. 
Vitals: LifeProof FRE Power case, $129.99 from www.lifeproof.com. 
— Jill K. Robinson, travel@sfchronicle.com
